item.title: Monitor All the Things using Docker and Monit
item.description: After setting up 329423 services and 823423 containers, you might want to manage your environment in case some service fails. This can be automated restarting, getting notified about failures or a similar thing. Say no more, I've created a Dockerfile and image for Monit for this.
